Package com.ourshipsgame.handlers

Interface Constant

All Known Implementing Classes:
DesktopLauncher, GameEngine, GameObject, GameScreen, GameSlider, HelpScreen, Hud, MenuScreen, OptionScreen, OptionsWindow, ScoreScreen
public interface Constant
Interfejs przechowujący kilka stałych do obliczeń itp
